xxl.core.indexStructures
Class MTree.Node

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree.Node
      xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree.Node
          xxl.core.indexStructures.MTree.Node
Direct Known Subclasses:
SlimTree.Node
Enclosing class:
MTree
public class MTree.Node
extends ORTree.Node

Node is the class used to represent leaf- and non-leaf nodes of MTree. Nodes are stored in containers.

See Also:
Tree.Node, ORTree.Node

protected ORTree.IndexEntry chooseSubtree(Descriptor descriptor,
                                          java.util.Iterator minima)
Description copied from class: ORTree.Node
Chooses the subtree which is followed during an insertion.

Specified by:
chooseSubtree in class ORTree.Node
Parameters:
descriptor - the Descriptor of data object
minima - an iterator of the IndexEntrys which may be chosen
Returns:
the index entry refering to the root of the chosen subtree

split

protected Tree.Node.SplitInfo split(java.util.Stack path)
Description copied from class: ORTree.Node
Splits the current node. A new node is created, but no handle is reserved for this node in its container (i.e. container.insert() or container.reserve() are not called at this stage). This means that no index entry for this node is passed to its parent-node.

Specified by:
split in class ORTree.Node
Parameters:
path - the nodes already visited during this insert
Returns:
a SplitInfo containig all information needed about the split

grow

protected void grow(java.lang.Object data,
                    java.util.Stack path)
Description copied from class: ORTree.Node
Inserts data into the current node. If level>0 data must be an index entry.

Overrides:
grow in class ORTree.Node
Parameters:
data - the entry to be inserted into the node
path - the path from the root to the current node

Updates the Sphere.distanceToParent used for optimization.

Parameters:
entry - the sphere to be updated
path - the path from the root to entry
